headline: Assessing 3M (MMM) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Ongoing PFAS And Consumer Segment Concerns
summary: 3M (MMM) is back in focus after its board declared a first quarter 2026 dividend of $0.78 per share, payable on March 12 to shareholders of record as of February 13, 2026. See our latest analysis for 3M. That new dividend arrives as 3M’s share price, now at $155.68, reflects mixed sentiment, with a 1-day share price return of 1.47% but a 30-day share price return decline of 3.79%, while longer term the 3-year total shareholder return of 78.07% contrasts sharply with the weaker recent...
